attributes.action: STOP COVID19! Close borders, implement curfews, close schools, ALL social events
attributes.additional_details: We have been successful in two World Wars. This is our Third. Our enemybis invisnle but that won't stop us! Enough with taking a 'different route' as the virus is taking the same route. Please please listen. We will beat this War but let's not let it take us down in the meantime. Quick action. Let's come out of this as successful as we have proven time and time again how great we are. Let's put the GREAT back into GREAT BRITAIN, and let's put us UNITED back in the United Kingdom.
attributes.background:
PLEASE listen to our people, our democracy.
We can stand strong as the UNITED KINGDOM and beat Covid19 before it beats us. Close schools, colleges, Uni's and pubs, clubs and restaurants. Impose a curfew and more importantly, close the borders! (14 day quarantine for ALL travellers). Save lives NOW!

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that schools, pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
